sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-container class="text-center">
        <v-row class="text-center">
            <v-col cols="12" 
                sm="1"
                xs="1"
                md="3"
                />
            <v-col cols="12"
                md="6"
                xs="10"
                sm="10"
            >
                <v-card
                    elevation="2"
                    class="px-6 top"
                    xs="top-mobile"
                    sm="top-mobile"
                >
                    <v-card-title >Faça seu Login</v-card-title>
                    <v-card-text>
                        <v-container>
                            <v-row  class="px-6">
                                <v-text-field
                                label="Usuário"
                                :rules="[rules.required]"
                                color="green"/>
                            </v-row>
                            <v-row  class="px-6 xs-6">
                                <v-text-field
                                    v-model="password"
                                    :append-icon="show1 ? 'mdi-eye' : 'mdi-eye-off'"
                                    :rules="[rules.required]"
                                    :type="show1 ? 'text' : 'password'"
                                    label="Senha"
                                    color="green"
                                    counter
                                    @click:append="show1 = !show1"
                                ></v-text-field>
                            </v-row>
                            <v-row class="px-6 pt-6">
                                <v-btn
                                    outlined
                                    large
                                    block
                                    color="green"
                                    >
                                    Continuar
                                </v-btn>
                            </v-row>
                        </v-container>
                    </v-card-text>
                </v-card>
            </v-col>
            <!-- <v-col 
                sm="1"
                xs="1" -->
                />
        </v-row>
    </v-container>
</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: 'LoginComponent',

    data: () =>({
      senha: "",
      usuario: "",
      show1: false,
      rules: {
          required: value => !!value || 'Obrigatório.'
        },
    }),
}
</script>
<style>
   .top {
    margin-top: 25% !important;
   }
   .top-mobile {
    margin-top: 55% !important;
   }
</style>
